paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In a study by Itzhaki Ben Zadok et al., echocardiograms in AL and ATTR-CA patients analyzed in the years prior to a formal diagnosis found LVH ≥ 12 mm in 79% of patients more than 3 years prior to diagnosis.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile variant is associated with increased amyloid fibril deposition leading to cardiac dysfunction.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families with hATTR.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most common mutation in the United States.
key_quotes: There are more than 130 TTR mutations identified, with the most common mutation in the United States being Val122Ile, present in 3–4% of African Americans.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
